titleStmt.title: A marriage sermon a sermon called A wife mistaken, or, A wife and no wife, or, Leah instead of Rachel : a sermon accused for railing against women, for maintaining poligamy, many wives, for calling Jacob a hocus-pocus : a sermon laught at more than a play (by the ignorant) for many such mistakes : iustified by the wise. Wisdome is justified of her children / by Tho. Grantham ...
titleStmt.author: Grantham, Thomas, d. 1664.

Wisdome is justified of her children / by Tho. Grantham ...
